Package com.intellij.openapi.vfs

Class VfsUtilCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VfsUtilCore
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VfsUtil

    public class VfsUtilCore
extends java.lang.Object
    Various utility methods for working with VirtualFile.

        Returns:

      • getRelativeLocation

        public static java.lang.String getRelativeLocation(VirtualFile file,
                                                   VirtualFile root)
        Gets a relative path of file to root when it's possible This method is designed to be used for file descriptions (in trees, lists etc.)
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        root - candidate to be parent file (Project base dir, any content roots etc.)
        Returns:
        relative path of file or full path if root is not actual ancestor of file

      • getRelativePath

        public static java.lang.String getRelativePath(VirtualFile file,
                                               VirtualFile ancestor)

      • getRelativePath

        public static java.lang.String getRelativePath(VirtualFile file,
                                               VirtualFile ancestor,
                                               char separator)
        Gets the relative path of file to its ancestor. Uses separator for separating files.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        ancestor - parent file
        separator - character to use as files separator
        Returns:
        the relative path or null if ancestor is not ancestor for file

      • findRelativePath

        public static java.lang.String findRelativePath(VirtualFile src,
                                                VirtualFile dst,
                                                char separatorChar)
        Returns the relative path from one virtual file to another. If src is a file, the path is calculated from its parent directory.
        Parameters:
        src - the file or directory, from which the path is built
        dst - the file or directory, to which the path is built
        separatorChar - the separator for the path components
        Returns:
        the relative path, or null if the files have no common ancestor

      • getVirtualFileForJar

        public static VirtualFile getVirtualFileForJar(VirtualFile entryVFile)

      • copyFile

        public static VirtualFile copyFile(java.lang.Object requestor,
                                   VirtualFile file,
                                   VirtualFile toDir)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Makes a copy of the file in the toDir folder and returns it.
        Parameters:
        requestor - any object to control who called this method. Note that it is considered to be an external change if requestor is null. See VirtualFileEvent.getRequestor()
        file - file to make a copy of
        toDir - directory to make a copy in
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file failed to be copied

      • copyFile

        public static VirtualFile copyFile(java.lang.Object requestor,
                                   VirtualFile file,
                                   VirtualFile toDir,
                                   java.lang.String newName)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Makes a copy of the file in the toDir folder with the newName and returns it.
        Parameters:
        requestor - any object to control who called this method. Note that it is considered to be an external change if requestor is null. See VirtualFileEvent.getRequestor()
        file - file to make a copy of
        toDir - directory to make a copy in
        newName - a new name of the file
        Returns:
        a copy of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file failed to be copied

        Converts VsfUrl info URL.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        converted URL or null if error has occurred.
